Este juego  es y espero que siga siendo uno de los fps mas jugados en mucho tiempo, es impresionante que despues  de 11 aÃ±os siga en el top de los juegos mas jugados en steam y con justa razon, siendo un gran juego el cual es muy divertido, emocionante, incluso en algunos casos frustrante pero de igual manera entretenido, pero siempre habra personas que no les guste, que diran que es malo, que no es divertido incluso lo compararan con nuevos juegos como overwatch, paladins entre otros asta el punto de decir que estos juegos mataran al team fortress algo que no creo que pase pero si lo hicieran que mas da, este juego nos a traido buenos personajes, armas unicas, modos de juego muy entretenidos, gorros de todo tipo, hackers, niÃ±os rata todo esto y mas desde el 2007, pese asu longevidad este juego ha logrado sacarme a mi y a otros miles de jugadores una sonrisa. La verdad te recomiendo que lo juegues por todo lo bueno y pese a todo lo malo, es  un gran juego. Gracias

Great game! And if you want to get the full experience but the Orange Box When it's on sale.(This will make it so that you aren't a Free to Play when you start,but that only means you are going to get weapons more often,not give you skill.

Great game. It's always there, even when you get sick of it, you're still able to come back to it later. I've had lots of enjoyment with TF2 and the community is a huge part of the reason it's so magnificent. Sadly Valve doesn't help the TF2 devs too much, so the updates are VERY slow, but 90% of the time when they DO come, they're wonderful. Overall it's a great game if you love FPS's with a bit of a twist. It's not your average COD game obviously but it does still have the core aspects of an FPS class-based system. The "DLC" or essentially battle passes are the only thing that cost money here, but even then you can do very well without, they're more of just an added bonus, as they don't give you any competitive advantage over other players. There are hundreds of cosmetics for your different classes but of course those are optional. TF2 is a great way to get into Steam trading/marketing too!  Definitely recommend, at least giving it a try. It's free so why not?

All I can say is, there is a good reason that this game's community has lasted 12 years now. The guns and movement in the game work together to make some of the best combat in an FPS. The art style, characters, and humor of the game have also contributed into this game's lifespan. It's just a gift that keeps on giving. (February 3rd, 2019) Now: Jesus H. Christ, this poor game. First, R.I.P. Rick May. Secondly, this game has slowed to not even the most pitiful crawl in terms of new content. Really is a shame, because this game was, and still is one of my most played games on Steam. But now I'm just not so sure about the game's official future anymore. At least Creators.TF has something going for it.
